Articles.Content: 1941 you find a reenactment of Pearl harbor bombing, complete with explosions.
1942:  You find a Sikorsky R-4 in pristine condition parked here.
1943: you find a elevator and get in, but it doesn't work
1944: A museum display resides here. Within you see the last Mosin-Nagant 91/30 rifle ever made.

1945. The floor is glowing, and not just from the heat.

You promptly run for the door and proceed to the next floor.
1946 you trip and tear the giant armistice paper on the floor, and WW2 drags on for another century...

On Floor 1947 you trip on an separatron and go rocketing up the stairs and above 1998, where you are teleported by the moderators to 1948.

Edited September 5, 2017 by KerBlitz Kerman

Floor 1948. You're in a vast room with strange flags and crazy empires. Scared by the threat of an Illuminati complot, you prepare to run to the next stage when you notice a strange sign saying :

" 100 remaining to binary completion."
floor 1949: nuclear bomb
Floor 1950 : You can't even walk on it : it's lava. Move on.
Floor 1951: Start of a depression. A random guy tries to take your money.
Floor 1952- The sun turns into a deadly lazer
Floor 1953- The B52s are 1 year old.
Floor 1954. Its floor is covered with thick layer of cheap transistors.
Floor 1955: an homage to Back to the Future.
1956: You see the suez canal.

1957:

you see a sputnik pass by, but it was going too fast, so you really didn't see all too, much, then you realize the floor is a vacuum, so now you run back to the elevator

1958:

here you just ask yourself if you should give your home computer to interpol, just per curiosity to ear what funny worms they may find in it
1959 Apollo 11 launches (a decade early) and snags your shirt. You fly up, and then fall down onto the top of the tower. As you writhe in pain, a trapdoor opens up and you fall down to floor 1960
1960: You finally land after snagging your eyelid on a nail. With blood everywhere, you manage to stagger to the nearest stairwell....

Floor 1961: You watch JFK talking about the Moon.

And you find a turbo elevator. Skip 3 floors.

3 hours ago, Joseph Kerman said:

Floor 1961: You watch JFK talking about the Moon.

And you find a turbo elevator. Skip 3 floors.

Unfortunately that turbo elevator has some peculiar steps in it. Lots of them... You decide to just go upstair.

 

Floor 1962 : You find a lot of different couples in disagreement over what house they should have (or other things really). They're all over the place hiding behind trees. Missed a bullet, you decide it's not going well and moved on upstair.

Edited November 3, 2017 by YNM
Floor 1963: There's a star in the room. You move on.
Floor 1963-You serenely walk across the floor until you see a trefoil and almost fall as you read it. '2 Sieverts Exposure' and tumble up the stairs.

Floor 1965:there is a balcony with a paper floor.

a tumbling rocket comes through the floor, launching you through a window to floor 1966.

the rockt explodes,destroying the three floors five above you.

the building drops down, and stops.

(the building may start to collapse later.
